name: news-summary-challenge
description: * Challenge time: rest of the day and weekend, until Monday 9am. * Feel free to use Google, your notes, books, etc. but work on your own. * If you refer to the solution of another coach or student, please put a link to that in your README. * If you have a partial solution, **still check in a partial solution** and send in a pull request. * You must submit a pull request to this repo with your code by 9am Monday morning.
author: Ben Galley
